00098     this->x = x;
00099     this->y = y;

00143 void Micropolis::spend(int dollars)
00144 {
00145     setFunds(totalFunds - dollars);
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00156 void Micropolis::setFunds(int dollars)
00157 {
00158     totalFunds = dollars;
00159     updateFunds();
00160 }

00169 Quad Micropolis::tickCount()
00170 {
00171 #ifdef _WIN32
00172     return (::GetTickCount() * 60) / 1000;
00173 #else
00174     struct timeval time;
00175     gettimeofday(&time, 0);
00176     return (Quad)((time.tv_sec * 60) + (time.tv_usec * 60) / 1000000);
00177 #endif
00178 }

00229 void Micropolis::doStartScenario(int scenario)
00230 {
00231     callback( "startScenario", "d", (int)scenario);

00234 
00240 void Micropolis::initGame()
00241 {
00242     simPaused = false; // Simulation is running.
00243     simPausedSpeed = 0;
00244     simPass = 0;
00245     simPasses = 1;
00246     heatSteps = 0; // Disable cellular automata machine.
00247     setSpeed(0);
00248 }

00250 
00275 void Micropolis::callback(const char *name, const char *params, ...)
00276 {
00277     if (callbackHook == NULL) {
00278         return;
00279     }
00280 
00281     va_list arglist;
00282     va_start(arglist, params); // beginning after last named argument: params
00283 
00284     (*callbackHook)(this, callbackData, name, params, arglist);
00285 
00286     va_end(arglist);
00287 }
00288 
00289 
00294 void Micropolis::doEarthquake(int strength)
00295 {
00296     makeSound("city", "ExplosionLow"); // Make the sound all over.
00297 
00298     callback("startEarthquake", "d", strength);
00299 }

00303 void Micropolis::invalidateMaps()
00304 {
00305     mapSerial++;
00306     callback("update", "s", "map"); // new
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00320 void Micropolis::makeSound(const char *channel, const char *sound,
00321                            int x, int y)
00322 {
00323     if (enableSound) {
00324         callback("makeSound", "ssdd", channel, sound, x, y);
00325     }
00326 }

00336 int Micropolis::getTile(int x, int y)
00337 {
00338     if (!testBounds(x, y)) {
00339         return DIRT;
00340     }
00341 
00342     return map[x][y];
00343 }
00344 
00345 
00353 void Micropolis::setTile(int x, int y, int tile)
00354 {
00355     if (!testBounds(x, y)) {
00356         return;
00357     }
00358 
00359     map[x][y] = (unsigned short)tile;
00360 }
